hypothesis: (s-001) There are Knight, Knave, and Spy roles
(s-004) Spy can either tell truth or lie
(s-005) Alice says: Among Violet, Quinn, Tina, and Bob, there is exactly one knight
(s-006) David says: Among Xavier, Yara, Tina, Alice, Bob, Quinn, and I, there are exactly six knaves
(s-007) Quinn says: Among Alice and David, exactly one person is lying
(s-008) Bob says: Alice and I have the same role
(s-009) Xavier says: Alice, Violet, Yara, Tina, Quinn, and David all have the same role

(s-012) Tina says: Quinn, Yara, David, and I all have the same role
